// å›½é™…åŒ–è¯­è¨€åˆ‡æ¢ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
import React, { createContext, useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const LanguageContext = createContext();

export const useLanguage = () => {
  const context = useContext(LanguageContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error('useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider');
  }
  return context;
};

// è¯­è¨€é…ç½®
export const LANGUAGES = {
  zh: {
    code: 'zh',
    name: 'ä¸­æ–‡',
    flag: 'ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³'
  },
  en: {
    code: 'en', 
    name: 'English',
    flag: 'ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸'
  }
};

export const LanguageProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [currentLanguage, setCurrentLanguage] = useState('zh');

  // ä»localStorageåŠ è½½ä¿å­˜çš„è¯­è¨€è®¾ç½®
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem('preferred-language');
    if (savedLanguage && LANGUAGES[savedLanguage]) {
      setCurrentLanguage(savedLanguage);
    } else {
      // æ£€æµ‹æµè§ˆå™¨è¯­è¨€
      const browserLanguage = navigator.language.toLowerCase();
      if (browserLanguage.startsWith('en')) {
        setCurrentLanguage('en');
      } else {
        setCurrentLanguage('zh');
      }
    }
  }, []);

  // åˆ‡æ¢è¯­è¨€
  const changeLanguage = (languageCode) => {
    if (LANGUAGES[languageCode]) {
      setCurrentLanguage(languageCode);
      localStorage.setItem('preferred-language', languageCode);
      
      // ä¸ºäº†æ›´å¥½çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä½“éªŒï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ é¡µé¢é‡æ–°åŠ è½½
      // window.location.reload();
    }
  };

  // è·å–å½“å‰è¯­è¨€çš„ç¿»è¯‘æ–‡æœ¬
  const t = (key, variables = null, fallback = key) => {
    const translations = getTranslations(currentLanguage);
    let text = translations[key] || fallback;
    
    // æ”¯æŒå˜é‡æ›¿æ¢ {variable}
    if (variables && typeof variables === 'object') {
      Object.keys(variables).forEach(varKey => {
        text = text.replace(new RegExp(`{${varKey}}`, 'g'), variables[varKey]);
      });
    }
    
    return text;
  };

  const value = {
    currentLanguage,
    changeLanguage,
    t,
    languages: LANGUAGES,
    isChineseLanguage: currentLanguage === 'zh',
    isEnglishLanguage: currentLanguage === 'en'
  };

  return (
    <LanguageContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </LanguageContext.Provider>
  );
};

// ç¿»è¯‘æ–‡æœ¬é…ç½®
const getTranslations = (language) => {
  const translations = {
    zh: {
